Mid Project - IMDB Enter movie Title Enter movie Description Pick Image Finish Main item title Delete all Selected image Add a movie Movie image Item detailed description Add your notes here Delete Movie Are you sure you want to delete this movie? Yes Movie deleted No Description Notes Overview Favorite Movies Nearby Movies Search Movies Movies in your region Add to favorites No favorite movies yet Unable to access location Movies in %1$s rating Add Movie Update Movie Batman Super Men One Piece Movie about Bruce Wayne who became Batman Movie about Clark Kent who is Supermen Show about Luffy who wants to become king of the pirates Release date not available Release Date
Enter Rating (0.0 - 10.0) Enter Release Date (DD/MM/YYYY) Please use the format DD/MM/YYYY Rating Rating cannot be negative Rating cannot exceed 10 Please enter a valid number Enter date as DD/MM/YYYY Month must be between 1 and 12 Day must be between 1 and 31 Year must be 1888 or later Release date cannot be after 2030 Please enter a valid date Rating is required Rating must be between 0 and 10 Please enter a valid number Enter rating (0-10) Release date is required DD/MM/YYYY Please use format DD/MM/YYYY Release date cannot be before 1888 Release date cannot be in the future Title is required Title must be at least 2 characters Description is required Description must be at least 10 characters Movie updated successfully Movie added successfully
No internet connection. Please check your connection and try again. Retry Error icon GPS is Disabled GPS is required for finding nearby movies. Would you like to enable it? Open Settings Cancel GPS is required to show movies in your region Grant Permission Location permission is required. Please go to Settings and select \"Allow all the time\" for location access.
Location Permission Required The app needs access to your location to display movies in your area. Please select "Allow only while using the app" in the next window. Location Access Denied To use this feature, you must grant location permission as "Allow only while using the app" in your device settings.
